When you are sitting in your physics lecture and all you can think about is your professor looking very similar to Wernher von Kerman. Then, zoning-out and doodling a new spacecraft design on the side of your notes.

I hope I didn't miss too much that day....

-When you open your mouth with some grin and you classmates instantly know what you're going to talk about.

-When you try to go on and EVA from boring lessons.
Oh so many dreams about orbital insertions. And thinking about my personal delta V as I walk around town, thinking I might go for a coffee and cake for a refuel.

When you wish you could parallel park by killing relative velocity to the parking space and using rcs to nudge your way in.

You know you play too much KSP when...

.. you look to your smartwatch and miss "alarm clock entries"

.. you align your real life to transfer windows and upcomming maneuvers (in non-timewarp-multiplayer game -> see next)

.. you get out of bed at 1, 3 and 6 o clock in the night to NOT miss an important maneuver

.. you start assembling rockets in your dreams (that actually works)

.. you begin speaking like "chatterer"

.. you begin speaking with kerbals

.. you rip the soundtrack from soundcloud and make it the new sleeping melodie of your kids (and of course for YOURSELF)

.. you build a second computer, just to monitor and control vessels in "dark multiplayer"

.. you urgently want to eat SNACKs instead of fresh and natural nutritions

.. you "FORGET" visiting toilette for 30+ hours

.. you build rockets that ascend constantly with 1m/s

.. you install 100+ mods

.. you canceled your cable tv cause you only watch KSP-streams anymore

.. you get member of the "2-months-extra-additional-holdidays-for-ksp-players-league"

.. your plants at home are now biomass

.. you start sleeping in crouch position

.. and funny: u want to catch that subway train 5 meters away but your legs can NOT

.. you have to leave the house for an EVA

.. you name your kids bill, bob and jeb (if you still do making babies)

.. you want to "tweak scale everything"

.. you want to mechjeb your daily work

.. you dont see the beautiful national park, you only "scansat" it

.. you recognize a meteor and think about if it was bill, bob or jeb who died now

.. you are not affected by leonard nimoy's dead \\//, (but kerbals do)

.. you watch vessel pics and want to right-click-spin-it
